recipesJson.name: Peach Arnold Palmer
recipesJson.author: Foment_life
recipesJson.description: Just as the name implies. Tea, with sweet lemonade and a bunch of peach. Very much reminiscent to the Snapple flavor

reviews.text: If you like peach snapple Iced tea but want it in a vape, this is it for me. I wish there was more to say but, this is the recipe for me if I want any kind of peachy Palmer. Great flavor, my kind of sweet (not too much) no dryness. Excellent.
This is what it is.  A peach arnold palmer, great summary vape, delicious on the golf course.
